column4: June 30 Onyx Pharmaceuticals Inc  said on Sunday it rejected a roughly $10 billion takeover offer from larger rival Amgen Inc as too low but is still considering a sale of the company.

column2: Swedish duo's "I Love It" tops Britain's singles chart LONDON
column3: June 30 Swedish DJ duo Icona Pop's "I Love It" entered the singles chart at number one on Sunday
column4: knocking Robin Thicke off the top spot he had held for four weeks
